Package stocks.model

Class PortfolioManagementModelImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • util.stocks.model.PortfolioManagementModelImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PortfolioManagementModel
    public class PortfolioManagementModelImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements PortfolioManagementModel
    An implementation of the PortfolioManagementModel. Has methods that creates portfolios, get portfolios, check if a portfolio exists, read portfolio from XML, write portfolio as XML for a given user.

      • validateTransaction

        public boolean validateTransaction​(java.util.List<TransactionItem> transactions,
                                   TransactionItem transaction)
        Description copied from interface: PortfolioManagementModel
        Performs a buy or a sell operation on the flexible portfolio's stocks based on the transaction line provided as an input.
        Specified by:
        validateTransaction in interface PortfolioManagementModel
        Parameters:
        transactions - the list of transactions associated with a portfolio.
        transaction - the transaction that is to be compared to the list of transactions.
        Returns:
        true if the stock quantity is more than 0, returns false if a sell is to be made pre-dates the latest sell on a ticker. Also returns 0 if the quantity is 0 or lesser.

      • getCostBasis

        public double getCostBasis​(java.util.List<TransactionItem> transactions,
                           java.lang.String date)
        Description copied from interface: PortfolioManagementModel
        Provides the cost basis of a portfolio for a given date. It gives the sum of all buys and commissions upto the given date input.
        Specified by:
        getCostBasis in interface PortfolioManagementModel
        Parameters:
        transactions - A list of all the transaction lines associated with a portfolio.
        date - The date for when the cost basis is to be calculated.
        Returns:
        a double value which gives the portfolio's cost basis on a given date.

      • constructPortfolioValuation

        public java.util.List<java.util.List<java.lang.String>> constructPortfolioValuation​(java.lang.String date)
                                                                             throws java.lang.Exception
        Description copied from interface: PortfolioManagementModel
        Get the valuation of the portfolio for a given date.
        Specified by:
        constructPortfolioValuation in interface PortfolioManagementModel
        Parameters:
        date - Date for which the valuation is calculated.
        Returns:
        2D list of the portfolio valuation with each stock's current value.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - when the price data for the ticker doesn't exist.

      • getPortfolioPerformance

        public java.util.List<java.util.Map.Entry<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Double>> getPortfolioPerformance​(java.lang.String d1,
                                                                                                            java.lang.String d2)
                                                                                                     throws java.lang.Exception
        Description copied from interface: PortfolioManagementModel
        Provides a list that has the valuation of a portfolio over a range of dates. The list size depends on the date range provided as an input. The list size is between 5 and 30(inclusive).
        Specified by:
        getPortfolioPerformance in interface PortfolioManagementModel
        Parameters:
        d1 - The from-date for evaluating the performance.
        d2 - The to-date for evaluating the performance.
        Returns:
        A list of tuples that stores the date and the portfolio's valuation on that date.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if the dates are not given in a valid format.
